EmailTemplate.name: IPM PL Email2
EmailTemplate.subject: Update of the Gate Section:{!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.Name} of Project {!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.IPM_Project_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
{!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.LastModifiedBy} has updated the {!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.IPM_Functional_Input_or_Summary__c} of the {!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.Name} {!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.IPM_Section_Name__c} of project :{!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.IPM_Project_Name__c} on {!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.LastModifiedDate} at {!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.IPM_Locale_Time__c}.Direct link to the section is as below:
{!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Org_Base_URL__c}apex/IPM_ProjectDocumentSectionEditor?Id={!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.IPM_Project_ID__c}&projDocSecId={!IPM_Project_Document_Section__c.Id}
Warm Regards,
